root.name: Smash Cars
root.description: OverviewSmash Cars in an R/C racer released for the Playstation 2. The game features 13 different racers, as well as a good amount of tracks based on real-world locations, typically not seen in R/C racing games. There are multiple race types including: Quick Race, Championship Mode, Stunt Race, and Special Mini-Games. Every track is unique and interactive in some way or another, such as dogs that try to eat your car, or humans who will attempt to give you the boot! A sequel to the game, also titled Smash Cars, was released in 2009.
